name: MergeChangelog
description: Compiles the changes into Changelog.md if one exists.
author: Enterwell

inputs.name: changelogLocation
inputs.label: Changelog Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the directory that contains Changelog.md.

inputs.name: changesInDifferentLocation
inputs.label: Different location of the 'changes' directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark this as true if the 'changes' directory exists somewhere else than on the changelog location.

inputs.name: shouldBumpVersion
inputs.label: Should bump version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the new version be bumped in the appropriate project file ('package.json' or '*.csproj').

inputs.name: pathToProjectFile
inputs.label: Path to the project file
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not set, the application will try to automatically determine the project file. Currently supported project types: NPM (package.json) and .NET SDK (*.csproj with the version tag).

outputVariables.name: bumpedSemanticVersion
outputVariables.description: Newly bumped semantic version based on the changes made.

outputVariables.name: bumpedMajorPart
outputVariables.description: Major part of the newly bumped version.

outputVariables.name: bumpedMinorPart
outputVariables.description: Minor part of the newly bumped version.

outputVariables.name: bumpedPatchPart
outputVariables.description: Patch part of the newly bumped version.

outputVariables.name: newChanges
outputVariables.description: Changes from the new changelog section.
